ShortDescription.Value: This mod introduces fishing into the game.

Publish.LongDescription:
## 🐟 Fish, Fish and More Fish!
**Because your city needs more seafood.** This mod introduces a temporary fishing industry system into Cities: Skylines II, giving you the power to harvest, process, and export fish—even before the official mechanics arrive.
---
### 🎣 What This Mod Does
- **Adds a Custom Fishing Industry Building** - Drag out **fishing zones** across rivers or coastlines to gather fish from the water. - Hook into your supply chain and build an economy powered by seafood.
- **Fish-to-Food Processing** - Industrial buildings will automatically convert fish into food for general use. - Supports population consumption and city growth.
- **Export and Economic Control** - Fish can be traded at any cargo terminal. - You can tax fish production like any other industry.
- **Fish Resource Refresher (Code Mod)** - Fish regenerate every **5 minutes of real-world time** to prevent rapid depletion. - Helps keep your fishing industry running smoothly—especially since fish don’t behave like other resources (yet).
---
### ⚠️ Temporary and Experimental
This mod is a **temporary solution** ahead of the official fishing mechanics.
When Colossal Order releases the official **fishing update**, these assets **may break or become grey boxes**. You’ll be able to safely bulldoze them. At that point, this mod will be **repurposed into proper, compatible fishing assets**.
---
### 🙏 Thanks and Credits
Big thank you to: - **StarQ and Washy** – for development help and support. - **Triton** – for letting me use parts of your ELT code to handle fish regeneration.
---
Enjoy fishing before it’s officially a thing!
